intro: Cassebeeria pedunculosa, commonly known as the Mexican firecracker, is a flowering plant native to Mexico and parts of Central America. Cassebeeria pedunculosa is often cultivated for its ornamental value due to its vibrant flowers and adaptability to various soil types.
